alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:00AM EDT until June 17 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1200 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Carrabelle, moving west at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... East Camp, Poplar Camp, Morgan Place, Vilas, Mcintyre, Twin Pole, Sanborn, Curtis Mill, Owens Bridge, Fort Gadsden and Lanark Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
